title: The Journal of Sir Walter Scott; From the Original Manuscript at Abbotsford
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: On Mr. Abercromby's retirement in 1839, he was raisedto the Peerage as Lord Dunfermline. He died at Colinton House on April17th, 1858, aged 81.
